name: harmony
description: Listen to music from Spotify, SoundCloud, Google Play Music or your local disk,
author: Vincent L

scripts.deb32: electron-installer-debian --productName Harmony --genericName 'Music Player' --icon icon.png --section sound --src dist/harmony-linux-ia32/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch i386
scripts.deb64: electron-installer-debian --productName Harmony --genericName 'Music Player' --icon icon.png --section sound --src dist/harmony-linux-x64/ --dest dist/installers/ --arch amd64
